meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to prevent or treat the flu.
meanings.sent1: I always keep antiflu in my medicine cabinet during flu season.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed antiflu to help me recover faster from the flu.
meanings.sent3: The antiflu worked like magic, making me feel better in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her care package was like an antiflu, warding off the flu bug.
meanings.sent5: The antiflu was my shield against the flu, keeping me healthy.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to something that is effective against the flu.
meanings.sent1: The antiflu shot helped protect me from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: She wore an antiflu mask to avoid catching the flu from others.
meanings.sent3: His antiflu precautions were so thorough, he never got sick.
meanings.sent4: The antiflu measures taken by the school reduced flu cases significantly.
meanings.sent5: The antiflu properties of the hand sanitizer kept germs at bay.
